title: kAdalaik-koLLai koNDa
sahitya:
kAdalaik-koLLai koNDa kaLvanai ulagilE kANbadengE sakhiyE


anupallavi

  nAda veLiyinilE jyOti mayamAga naTamADi en uLLam iDam koNDa dhiDam koNDa


caraNam    konjum kuzhandai pOnra nenjat-teLivilO koNDal vaLarum shOlai viNDa malarilO
pancabhUtangaLilO pariti matigaLilO pArAdu pArkkinra paramArtha gatiyilO
